article_title: Israel chooses Eurovision act amid boycott calls
sentence: The  Palestinian  Islamist  group  Hamas,  which  governed  Gaza,  launched  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October,  which  killed  1,200  people  -  mainly  civilians.

article_title: Israel chooses Eurovision act amid boycott calls
sentence: The  attack  triggered  Israel's  military  offensive,  which  has  killed  nearly  28,000  Palestinians  -  mostly  women  and  children  -  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel chooses Eurovision act amid boycott calls
sentence: Three  singers  who  had  auditioned  for  the  show  were  among  the  concertgoers  massacred  by  gunmen  at  the  Supernova  Music  Festival.

article_title: Israel chooses Eurovision act amid boycott calls
sentence: Another  contestant  -  26-year-old  Shaul  Greenglick  -  dropped  out  of  the  contest  in  December  when  his  military  reservist  duty  resumed,  and  was  killed  in  Gaza  on  26  December.

sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.
